name: QR Code Generator
description: In this project I created a QR code generator service. Users can type an arbitrary text or url into an input box hit a button and this tiny app generates a printable QR code encoding the input.
long: This could be useful in a party sharing the WiFi password with others. I learned some basic node.js and serving some page with a server using the pug view engine.
